title: How much fps would I get with these specs?
body:
I`m planning on buying a computer with the following specs:


CPU:                            Xeon x5450 @3.0 GHZ
CPU Cooler:               Hyper T4 Cooler
Motherboard:            Dell  Motherboard
Memory (RAM):         4gb DDR2 PC 6400
Storage:	                    200gb SATA Hard Drive
Power Supply:            480W Power Supply 
Case:                          LOGISYS CS206BK Mid Tower Case
Graphics Card:           AMD Radeon 7770



How much fps would I get on average? and while we`re on the subject, if anyone plays csgo, can you tell me how much fps i`ll get on csgo too?( You don`t have to).

replies.body: DDR2... Think of upgrading that ram It's cheap to do
You're going to get over 250 Fps.

I can't really diagnose your pc specs, but I would suggest checking out the [**BuildAPC Subreddit**](https://www.reddit.com/r/buildapc/) as they are really helpful for pc estimations and such! You could also go through the [**PcPartPicker Forum**](https://pcpartpicker.com/forums/) for more advice.

As long as you're meeting the [**Minimum Specs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) though, you're good to go.
